Text: Jayray you're a star..muchas grassy arse
Thank you JayRay for this upload. It's good to have someone uploading and seeding these hard to get movies. I appreciate it very much. Awesome speeds too.
yeah it's a great movie but the video aspect is not right and it could use a bit more bandwidth or better codex. so I hear :)
